userInterests.title: My Interests
userInterests.pageDescription: Help us understand your collecting interests! Add categories of items you'd like to follow, and we'll notify you when matching items become available in our auctions. You can always adjust your preferences here.
userInterests.searchInstructions: Use the search box below to find and add categories that interest you. You can search by typing any part of the category path (e.g., 'Stamps', 'Germany', or '1900'). Categories where you've previously bid will remain in your list even when inactive, and you can reactivate them at any time using the search. Categories without bids will be removed when deactivated.
userInterests.noSearchResults: No matching categories found. Try different search terms.
userInterests.browseExplanation: View items that match your selected categories of interest. The items will be automatically filtered based on your active categories.

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.emailInstructions: Please use the email you have used to register with as your login name.
login.passwordInstructions: If you have forgotten your password please use the forgot password link below to reset.
login.termsAgreement: I have read and accepted the {0}Auctioneers Terms and Conditions{1} and {2}Data Privacy Terms{3} and I agree to abide by them.

errors.badCredentials: We couldn't verify your account. Please check that you've entered the correct email and password. If you continue to have trouble, you can reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link below, or contact us for more assistance.
errors.networkError: Connection problem. Please try again later.

register.title: Create Account
register.instructions: In order to bid in our auctions, please complete full registration.
register.termsAcceptance: I have read and accepted the Auctioneers <1>Terms and Conditions</1> and <3>Data Privacy Terms</3> and I agree to abide by them.
register.successMessage: Registration successful! You will be redirected to your account page.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.instruction1: Please enter your email address to receive a password reset link.
forgotPassword.instruction2: An email with a one-time reset link will be sent to your email.
forgotPassword.successMessage: Password reset link has been sent to your email.
forgotPassword.errorMessage: Failed to send password reset link. Please try again.
forgotPassword.generalError: An error occurred. Please try again.

myAccount.noAddressesMessage: In order to participate in our auction, you need to complete your registration by entering an address. Please fill in the address in the form below.
myAccount.connectionFailed: Connection to user profile failed. Please reload the page to resolve the issue. If the problem persists, please contact our support team for assistance.
myAccount.networkError: Profile loading failed due to network issues. Please reload the page to resolve the problem. If the issue persists, please contact our support team for assistance.
myAccount.title: My Account
myAccount.enterWebsite: Enter your website URL starting with http:// or https://
myAccount.validUrlMessage: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://
myAccount.enterShippingInstructions: Enter any special shipping instructions here
myAccount.phoneNumberInstructions: Please enter your local phone number. The full formatted number, including the international country code, will be displayed below.
myAccount.enterProfessionalReferences: Please provide names of other auction companies you've worked with.
myAccount.optInCommunications: I consent to receiving marketing communications and updates via email, SMS, and mail.

addressForm.title: Title
addressForm.initializationError: An error occurred while initializing the address formatter. Please try again.
addressForm.provincesLoadError: An error occurred while loading the provinces. Please try again.
addressForm.saveError: An error occurred while saving. Please try again.
addressForm.override_address_name: Use this fields only if you want to override Client Name for this address.
addressForm.firstAddressDefault: This address will be set as your default address since it's your first one.

changePassword.networkError: Network response was not ok for resetting password
changePassword.generalError: An error occurred. Please try again.

myBids.filterHighest: Items where I'm the highest bidder
myBids.filterNotHighest: Items where I'm not the highest bidder
myBids.noActiveSales: There are no active sales at the moment
myBids.navigateToSaleOrItemPage: Navigate to sale or item page
myBids.networkResponseError: Network response was not ok for user details
myBids.noBidsPlaced: No bids have been placed for this sale.
myBids.clickOnSaleName: Click on the Sale name above to see details about your Bids & Credit for that sale.
myBids.cannotEditGroup: Or Bid Group editing is only available for active items
myBids.groupRemoved: Item removed from Or Bid Group
myBids.groupAssigned: Item assigned to Or Bid Group {{group}}
myBids.groupUpdateError: Failed to update Or Bid Group
myBids.groupHasClosedItems: Cannot add to this group - it contains closed items

orGroupExplanation.title: OR Bids Group
orGroupExplanation.main: Add lots to a group (A-J) when you want to win only one item. Once you win an item in the group, your other group bids are cancelled'
orGroupExplanation.example: Example: If lots 1, 2, 3 are in Group A and you win lot 1, your bids on lots 2 and 3 will be automatically cancelled

myCredit.maxBidLimitsHelp: In this section you can set your own limit to any bidder number you have. Limiting the bids will cut off your potential winnings at that number so you don't end up winning more than you have planned on spending.
myCredit.pendingCreditStatusMessage: Your credit request of {{amount}} is pending.
myCredit.approvedCreditStatusMessage: Your credit request of {{amount_request}} has been approved.
myCredit.approvedCreditStatusMessageModified: Following review, your credit request of {{amount_request}} has been set to {{current_amount}}.
myCredit.instructions: How much credit would you like to request? Once this limit is reached, you will not be able to place further bids.
myCredit.noCommasOrDecimals: Please do not use commas or decimal points.
myCredit.creditRequestDescription: Your credit request for {{amount}} has been submitted.
myCredit.rejectedCreditStatusMessage: Your credit request has been rejected. Your current credit is {{amount}}.
myCredit.rejectedCreditStatusMessageUnlimited: Your credit request has been rejected. You have unlimited credit.

bid.rejectedMailAfterSetLastFloor: Rejected and bid set to Floor

biddingInfo.liveCreditDescription: Determines the credit for Internet bids. This applies only to online bidders.
biddingInfo.mailCreditDescription: Determines the credit for auto bids. If a Bidder with € 100 credit has a mail bid on an Item with opening price of € 200 they can't win. Note that they are allowed however to place a Mail bid of € 400, they just cannot win it.
biddingInfo.maxBidDescription: An online bidder limit. Note that the bidder may also change their limit through their My Account page.
biddingInfo.openingPriceDescription: Make sure to save the opening price, before re-knock down.
biddingInfo.reKnockDownDescription: By re-knocking down, the Bid server will re-calculate the winning Bid. If a winning bid is found, status will be set to Sold, otherwise to Unsold. Note that the highest bid should be equal or above the Opening price.

legacy.AgreedWithTerms: I have read and accepted the Auctioneers Terms and Conditions and Data Privacy Terms and I agree to abide by them.
legacy.CreditIsRequiredForAgentBids: In order to place Agent bids, you must have a Credit limit set. Click here to set the Credit.
legacy.CreditIsRequiredForMailBids: In order to place Mail bids, you must have a Credit limit set and approved. Click here to set the Credit.
legacy.CreditIsRequiredButPendingForMailBids: In order to place Mail bids, you must have a Credit limit set and approved. Your credit request is not yet approved. Click here to see or update the Credit request.
ForgotPasswordInstructions: Please enter the email address for the account you wish to access.
An email with a one time reset link will be sent you your email.
LoginInstructions: Please use the email you have used to register with as your login name.
If you have forgotten your password please use the forgot password link below to reset.
RegisterInstructions: In order to bid in our auctions, please complete full registration.
legacy.ResetPasswordSuccess: Your password has been reset. Please login using the link at the top right, or by clicking here.
legacy.YourCurrentAgentBidIsWithAmount: Your current Online Agent bid is
legacy.BidderLimitNote: Please note that this limit only applies to your written bids (including those submitted in the online catalogue).
legacy.BidderLimitDescription: Please enter the maximum amount you would like to bid excluding commission and lot fee, please note that a deviation of approx. 10% cannot always be avoided.
legacy.CreditRequestDescription: How much credit would you like to request? Once this limit is reached, you will not be able to place further bids.
legacy.CreditRequestPending: Thank you for your credit request. A member of staff will review your request shortly.

CurrentCreditAndPending.RegularAndRegular: Your current credit is {existing} and you have a pending request for {pending}
CurrentCreditAndPending.NoneAndRegular: You have no current credit but you have a pending request for {pending}

CurrentMaximum.None: Your current maximum is not set

legacy.NumberInput: Please do not use commas or decimal points.
legacy.YourBidderLimitHasBeenUpdated: Your bidder limit has been updated

myFavorites.selectMoreItems: Select at least 2 items to compare
myFavorites.addTooltip: Click this button to add this item to your watch list
myFavorites.removeTooltip: Click this button to remove the item from your watch list

myFavorites.removeSuccess: Lot has been removed from your watch list
